channel.title: talks on M²LInES
channel.description: Recent content in talks on M²LInES

item.title: Talks
item.description: Big Data Discover Pangeo Forge and how it can help us solve complex problems in climate and weather research here with Ryan Abernathey. Machine Learning for Physics discovery Blending Physics and Machine Learning for Climate Projections in this talk with Laure Zanna. Learn about physics-guided Machine Learning in this talk by Pierre Gentine. Discovering equations from data for ocean mesoscale parametrizations here with Laure Zanna. Climate models and implementation Challenges in modelling the oceans for climate in this presentation by Alistair Adcroft.
